MIMIC4EHRDataset: Dataset class for MIMIC-IV EHR

Source: R/Dataset_MIMIC4EHRDataset.R
MIMIC4EHRDataset.Rd

MIMIC4EHRDataset: Dataset class for MIMIC-IV EHR

MIMIC4EHRDataset: Dataset class for MIMIC-IV EHR

Usage

# S3 method for class 'initialize'
MIMIC4EHRDataset(...)

Details

This class inherits from BaseDataset and is specialized for handling MIMIC-IV EHR data. It ensures key tables like patients, admissions, and icustays are included, and allows appending additional tables. It also logs memory usage if needed.

Super class

RHealth::BaseDataset -> MIMIC4EHRDataset

Methods

Public methods

  • MIMIC4EHRDataset$new()

  • MIMIC4EHRDataset$clone()

Inherited methods
  • RHealth::BaseDataset$collected_global_event_df()
  • RHealth::BaseDataset$default_task()
  • RHealth::BaseDataset$get_patient()
  • RHealth::BaseDataset$iter_patients()
  • RHealth::BaseDataset$load_data()
  • RHealth::BaseDataset$load_table()
  • RHealth::BaseDataset$set_task()
  • RHealth::BaseDataset$stats()
  • RHealth::BaseDataset$unique_patient_ids()

Method new()

Initialize MIMIC4EHRDataset

Usage

MIMIC4EHRDataset$new(
  root,
  tables = character(),
  dataset_name = "mimic4_ehr",
  config_path = NULL,
  dev = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

root

Root directory of the dataset.

tables

Character vector of extra tables to include.

dataset_name

Optional dataset name. Default is "mimic4_ehr".

config_path

Optional path to YAML config file.

dev

Logical flag for dev mode.

...

Additional arguments passed to BaseDataset.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

MIMIC4EHRDataset$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
